title: Color Generator With Local Cache
description: You change the numbers of red green and blue to create a color using those numbers with local cache.

title: ToDos
description: You can add todos and save them for later and you can delete when you're finished.

title: Online Notepad
description: You type on the whole page and save the text you typed for later.

title: Color Generator
description: You change the numbers of red, green and blue to create a color using those numbers

title: Random Color Generator
description: You press a button to generate a random color and see a table of red, blue and green colors used to make that random color

title: Decimal to Others
description: You give a number and it returns a table showing that number in binary, octal, hex and hexa decimal

title: Tables with range
description: Multiplies a specific number by when you start to when you end your range and gives a table of the result.

title: Tables
description: Multiplies a specific number by 1, 2, 3 and all numbers until 10 and gives a table of the result.

title: Generate Numbers
description: Adds 2 numbers for a specific number of times and shows a table for the result.
